algorithm_technique: Count elements less than target and elements equal to target to determine the starting index and range.
problem_summary_simple: Find indices of a target value in an array after sorting it.
problem_summary_technical: Counts elements smaller than the target and elements equal to the target to directly compute the target indices without explicit sorting.
key_insights: Sorting the array is not necessary; counting elements is more efficient.
The number of elements less than the target determines the starting index of the target elements.
The number of elements equal to the target determines how many indices will contain the target.
